snippet: A 90-yard punt return by Hamilton’s Brandon Banks for an apparent go-ahead touchdown with 35 seconds left was wiped out by an illegal block, and the Calgary Stampeders held off the Tiger-Cats, 20-16, in the Grey Cup in Vancouver, British Columbia.
abstract: Calgary Stampeders defeat Hamilton Tiger-Cats, 20-16, to win Canadian Football League's Grey Cup.
lead_paragraph: A 90-yard punt return by Hamilton’s Brandon Banks for an apparent go-ahead touchdown with 35 seconds left was wiped out by an illegal block, and the Calgary Stampeders held off the Tiger-Cats, 20-16, in the Grey Cup in Vancouver, British Columbia.
